divs: Sighting DetailsIt was sometime within the 2nd week of january,school had just started up agian. i had a early class at 7, it was around a 30 min drive so i was drving a little after 6 am i just passed southmoore high school on sante fe at the intersection of Sante fe and SW 34th street i could see in the distnace to the south a bright light, i assumed was a plane landing because it was so bright and so low but as i got to W indian hills road i realized,i was still pretty sleepy, that there is no airport near by, the closest is Will rogers i think in the opposite direction, and it hadnt moved in the 10 minutes i was watching it but it kinda look like it was like glowing or pulsing but not moving, i started driving toward it on indian hills road and i soon realized how low it was, but i couldnt really tell where it was i crossed a bridge over I-35 and since it still hadent moved i thought it was a helicopter so i was hoping i could see it better since it kept getting bigger as i got closer i got to the intersection of 24th street and realized its right along the road, i turned off my music and listend for helicopter sounds, all i heard was the engine of my truck, i got closer and soon realized this wasnt normal the one object now appered as 3 lights i think they were conected cuz the outside lights appered to have a curve to them like as if curving to the surface of th eobject i really dont know all i could see was three lights forming a line that i kept getting closer to i was so close i still didnt know what i was looking at but i was still calm for somereason, in hindsight i dont know i didnt freak out but i went down a hill then as soon as the hill curved back up i was directly underneath it i stoped pretty close to right underneath it i looked up my windshield and it was sort of the shape of a diamond but there were 4 outer lights and on each extior side of light the light like curved or had a boomerrang light attached to the light kind of like a bell but where the bell widen was just a thin curve attached to a ball of light, there was a light in the middle that was just round, i stared up at it for what felt like forever, it was right above the powerlines it really looked as if it was hoovering on them almost touching them, i heard no soundeds i just stared aimlessly up at this light not scared but just captivated and curious it felt like i had been there an hour but i looked at the clock and it had only been 10 mins so i decided that i should contniue on my way to school i drove past it it was still there but i turned onto 12th street and look behind me and it was no longer there it was completly gone i got extremely cold, it was very cold outside and my truck heater leaves alot to be desired and i realized the entire time i was underneath i wasnt cold at all , when i got to school i touched the roof of my truck and it was alot warmer then the hood of my truck. none of this bothered me unitl the next morning when i was extremly nervous to go down that road again but i did have done almost everyday and havent seen it again since
Summary: Driving to an early class i saw a bright object in the distance that never moved
